project.name: J-C674A-LUCE-08-ST02-DT03-DF07-CF01-01
project.description: This test takes a string, gets the first character, and uses a recursive method to look for the index of the second occurrence of that character. If the character does not appear a second time, it will recurse indefinitely.

iopair.name: J-C674A-LUCE-08-ST02-DT03-DF07-CF01-01-GOOD-01
iopair.description: index a single file Environment variable defining string value.

scoring_formula.formula: GOOD-01 AND GOOD-02 AND GOOD-03 AND GOOD-04 AND NOT TIMEOUT AND NOT CONTROLLED_EXIT

output_checks.simple_check: if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfe ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
if [[ -a ../testData/good-01-index/_0.cfs ]]; then exit 0; else exit 1; fi;
